svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Figure illustrates total population by country. Gapminder estimates are used until 1949; the UN Population Division
estimates from 1950-2015; and the World Bank's WDI population figures for 2016.
Source: Gapminder until 1949, UN Population Division from 1950-2015, World Bank for 2016
